instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-00165 no green/orange light no power
threads.message:
no sign of corrosion 
tried replace IO board/ribbon still same 
i didnt see any short circuit
PPBUS 8.19V
i notice that pin 13 on u7000 is no voltage also SMC_RESET_L 0V but not shorted. 
i tried osci on U5110 Mhz is flactuating (looping) 
SMC chip issue? need replace?

threads.title: 820-00165 no green/orange light no power
threads.message:
Post U5110 all voltages.
Be sure R5100 is good.
